main event: A bright yellow round object was observed in the sky, resembling a huge explosion with burning pieces falling from it.
interesting points: The object was described as a huge round bright yellow ball against a dark skyline., The sighting occurred at mile 394 on Glenn Highway in Gakona, Alaska., The observer viewed the object while in a moving vehicle., No sound was heard during the observation., There were no military or civilian aircraft known to be operating in the area at the time.
witness description: The observer was in a moving vehicle and was identified as a contractor.
